name: The Forest Of The Murders
description:
-History-

You are a policeman named William and your boss calls you to tell you that you have to go to a forest where it is said that there are murders, you go and it gets dark and you stay camping.

Story In development

--------------------------------------------------------------

Version 0.1.0  =Alpha=

Important bugs:

1. It takes 1 or 2 minutes to go to the next scene (Only happens in the House Scene).

If you have any problem, please let me know
